headline: Vertiv, Baker Hughes and Other ‘Fallen Angel’ Stocks Due for a Rebound
summary: The downbeat mood on Wall Street could be a great opportunity to buy the dip in quality stocks, according to a Wednesday report by J.P. Morgan.

headline: Why Baker Hughes Company (BKR) Stock is Falling This Week
summary: We recently published a list of Energy Stocks that are Losing This Week.
